short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redeem channel points on any live Twitch stream and keep track of the points you earn across all channels!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically redeem channel points for live Twitch.tv streams.

Track the points you earn for each channel, for each viewing session and the total number of points earned from the moment you installed this extension. Including any points earned from 'Predictions'!

Features a clean Twitch-themed UI to control the extension including:
 - Turning on/off the auto-clicker functionality.
 - Turning on/off debug mode, which logs information to the console.
 - Ability to reset the point count for the channel you're currently viewing.
 - Ability to reset the total point count.
 - A link to support me, if that's your thing. :)

Source available at: https://github.com/zer02wo/Twitch-Auto-Channel-Points
